definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
United Kingdom/British/England/English/abbr. for 英國|英国[Ying1 guo2]
building/shop/term for certain service establishments/embassy or consulate/schoolroom (old)/CL:家[jia1]

sentences.english: And by the way, the most crowdy place in the whole museum is the gift shop.
sentences.chinese: 整座大英博物館裏，就屬禮品店裏的人最多。

sentences.english: Sutra of the Ten Kings, now in British Museum.
sentences.chinese: 地藏十王圖畫圈，現存大英博物館。

sentences.english: My mother's food coupons will go to the British Museum as I have promised.
sentences.chinese: 我已經答應把母親留給我的糧票捐贈給大英博物館。

sentences.english: Some of the sculptures and frieze sections survived and can be seen today at the British Museum in London, England.
sentences.chinese: 殘存的部分雕刻和材料現在保存在英國大英博物館裏。

sentences.english: The British Museum? Yeah, it's huge.
sentences.chinese: 大英博物館？是的，它很大。

sentences.english: The reading room of the British Museum, UK.
sentences.chinese: 大英博物館中央閱讀室，倫敦。

sentences.english: Speaking of the British Museum, could you tell us what it's like?
sentences.chinese: 說到大英博物館，你能告訴我們它是什麼樣子的嗎？

sentences.english: Can you tell us about the British Museum?
sentences.chinese: 能給我們講講大英博物館嗎？

sentences.english: I particularly want to visit the British Museum and the Tower of London.
sentences.chinese: 我尤其想參觀大英博物館和倫敦塔和西敏寺。

sentences.english: How do you get to the British Museum?"
The main university center is located in the Bloomsbury section of London, near the British museum.
sentences.chinese: 主校區位於布盧姆茲伯裏區，在大英博物館附近。

sentences.english: However, the British Museum is forbidden by law from giving up any part of its collection.
sentences.chinese: 然而，英國法律禁止大英博物館交出任何館藏品。

sentences.english: My first day in London started with a morning visit to the British Museum.
sentences.chinese: 我在倫敦第一天的早晨就去參觀了大英博物館。

sentences.english: Miss Valentina Marabini – Chinese painting conservator, Hirayama Studio, British Museum.
sentences.chinese: 邱錦仙，資深中國畫修復專家，大英博物館。

sentences.english: Now the product is still being displayed in the Great Britain Museum of London.
sentences.chinese: 現倫敦大英博物館即有其製成品陳列。

definition: to collect in a museum or library/museum collection/library holdings
Palace Museum, in the Forbidden City, Beijing/National Palace Museum, Taipei
specimen/sample/the root cause and symptoms of a disease

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Guo2 jia1 Bo2 wu4 guan3
